-----------------------------------------------------------------
NeuronGPU
A GPU-MPI library for simulation of large-scale networks
 of spiking neurons
Homepage: https://github.com/golosio/NeuronGPU
Author: B. Golosio, University of Cagliari
email: golosio@unica.it
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Data will be written to: /home/golosio/rslsync/home/progetti/Potjans_2014_new/ngpu/Potjans_2014/data/
  Directory already existed. Old data will be overwritten.

Creating Poisson generators for background input.
Connecting neuronal populations recurrently.
